name: File Store bot by codeflix
description: file sharing bot store posts and it can be accessed by special links

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Bot token, Get it from @Botfather

OWNER_ID.description: An integer consisting of your owner ID

APP_ID.description: Your app ID, take it from my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Your API hash, take it from my.telegram.org

CHANNEL_ID.description: Make a channel (database channel), then make the bot as admin in channel, and note its ID

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL.description: ID of the channel or group. If you want to enable the force sub feature, else put 0

ADMINS.description: A space-separated list of user IDs of admins. They can only create links
